title: MOVES-JPMorgan, Royal Bank Of Canada, Lloyds Banking Group
text:
May 1, 2018 / 1:08 PM / in 14 minutes MOVES-JPMorgan, Royal Bank Of Canada, Lloyds Banking Group Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 1 (Reuters) - The following financial services industry appointments were announced on Tuesday. To inform us of other job changes, email moves@thomsonreuters.com. NATIXIS SA
Natixis has hired Robert Gardiner to work in its Scandinavian and Dutch financial institutions group origination business, according to a source. LLOYDS BANKING GROUP PLC
James Garvey, head of markets for commercial banking, will retire from the bank on July 2 after nine years at the UK lender. Lloyds said Eduardo Stock da Cunha will replace Garvey in July. ROYAL BANK OF CANADA
Matthew Davies, a managing director at RBC, has left the bank and is retiring after working over 30 years in capital markets according to a source familiar with the matter. JPMORGAN CHASE & CO
The bank has appointed Tia Counts as head of advancing black leaders for EMEA. (Compiled by Sanjana Shivdas)
